703330f-b.text:
(1)
Brighton Beach Ave., south side, between East 4th Street and Coney Island Ave., showing a view, taken from the Culver Line platform, looking southeast, of the Brighton Beach Hotel being demolished. Standing alone but once connected with the hotel is the Brighton Beach
Musio Hall.
July 1S, 1924.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
(2)
The same, demolished.
November 25, 1924.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
(3)
The same.
November 25, 1984.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
(4)
The same, showing partially cleared site of the hotel and a view
eastward.
November 25, 1924.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

stories.
